trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的活动期内的指定时间查找 （跳过） 功能的触发器操作<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use a SeekStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 用于<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>要查找<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard></xref:System.Windows.Trigger></xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>的 SeekStoryboard 操作

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，查找操作不考虑情节提要的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>到帐户的设置︰ 情节提要将被视为具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>的 1 和没有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 暂停、 恢复、 停止或否则为控制情节提要以交互方式到可以暂停、 恢复或以其他方式控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>以交互方式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>属性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>并用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>对象 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 来控制通过引用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>开始后不能以交互方式对其进行控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[如何︰ 使用事件触发器，以控制 a 情节提要后它将开始](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置情节提要应从查找源<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>移动向前或向后量

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: 一个正整数或负的值，指定情节提要应从查找源<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>移动向前或向后量

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此查找操作的位置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>应用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>此属性<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref>应序列化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果<> *1> 此属性<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref>序列化; 否则为应为* *false**。
